attributes.action: Reform the exams faced at school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At school people are being taught to pass an pre-defined exam. They are not learning the subject also their is too much importance placed on final exams.  Frankly 2-3 hours to sum up a whole years work is ridiculous.                                                     
                                                        There has to be exam reform immediately.
